name: @npolar/patch-event
description: Receive (JSON) [Patch](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6902) operation events on user input

scripts.prepare: cd node_modules && rm rfc6902 -rf && git clone https://github.com/chbrown/rfc6902 && cd rfc6902 && git checkout v3.0.4 && cd ../..
scripts.prebuild: yarn tsc node_modules/rfc6902/*.ts -t ES2019 -m es2015 --outDir node_modules/rfc6902/esm --removeComments && yarn rollup node_modules/rfc6902/esm/patch.js node_modules/rfc6902/esm/pointer.js --output.format esm --output.dir src/rfc6902
